how-to-use: Create a new object for each game. To upload to firestore use the command node 'scripts/populateFirestore.js' in the projects root terminal.

name: Stumble Guys
description: NOTE: Game will throw an error becuase of a CORS Policy but just ignoore it it will work fineYou dont realize how hard it is to steal a game this large. The code is very fragile and could break in the future. Stumble Guys is a multiplayer party game where players compete in obstacle courses and mini-games to be the last one standing. The game features colorful graphics, fun characters, and a variety of challenges to keep players entertained.

name: Steal a Brainrot
description: Steal a Brainrot is a multiplayer online game where players compete to steal each other's brainrots while avoiding obstacles and enemies. The game features various levels and challenges, and players can customize their characters with different skins and accessories.

name: Melon Sandbox
description: Melon Sandbox is a sandbox game that allows players to create and manipulate objects in a virtual environment. Players can use various tools to build structures, create physics-based simulations, and experiment with different materials.

name: Slither.io
description: Slither.io is a multiplayer online game where players control a snake and try to consume pellets to grow larger while avoiding other snakes. (Also Unity so there are no saves)

name: Snow Rider 3D
description: Snow Rider 3D is a fun and addictive racing game where players control a snowmobile and navigate through snowy tracks filled with obstacles and challenges. name: Buckshot Roulette
description: Buckshot Roulette is a thrilling multiplayer game where players take turns shooting at each other with a shotgun. The last player standing wins the game.

name: OvO 3
description: OvO 3 is a fun and addictive platform game where players control a character that jumps and navigates through various levels filled with obstacles and challenges. This sequel introduces new levels, characters, and gameplay mechanics.

name: OvO 2
description: OvO 2 is a fun and addictive platform game where players control a character that jumps and navigates through various levels filled with obstacles and challenges. This sequel introduces new levels, characters, and gameplay mechanics.

name: OvO
description: OvO is a fun and addictive platform game where players control a character that jumps and navigates through various levels filled with obstacles and challenges.

name: Draw the Hill
description: Draw the Hill is a fun and addictive game where players draw lines to create hills and guide a ball to the finish line. The game features various levels with different challenges and obstacles.

name: BitLife
description: BitLife is a life simulation game where players make choices that affect their character's life from birth to death. Players can choose careers, relationships, and various life events.

name: Crazy Cattle 3D
description: Crazy Cattle 3D is a fun and addictive game where players control a cow and navigate through various levels filled with obstacles and challenges. The goal is to collect items and reach the finish line while avoiding hazards. (ai is stupid but you know what this is lol)

name: Bottle Flip 3D
description: Bottle Flip 3D is a fun and addictive game where players flip a bottle and try to land it upright on various surfaces. The game features different levels and challenges to test your flipping skills.
2048 is a simple yet addictive puzzle game where players slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them and reach the number 2048.

name: Bloxorz
description: Bloxorz is a fun and challenging puzzle game where players control a block and navigate it through various levels by rolling it over tiles to reach the goal.

name: Google Solitare
description: Solitare is a classic card game where players aim to move all cards to the foundation piles by following specific rules. The game is played with a standard deck of cards and involves strategic thinking and planning.

name: Obby on a Bike (Roblox)
description: Obby on a Bike is a fun and challenging obstacle course game where players navigate through various levels on a bike, avoiding obstacles and completing challenges.

name: Clash Royale
description: Clash Royale is a real-time strategy game where players collect and upgrade cards featuring Clash of Clans troops, spells, and defenses. Players can build their own decks and battle against other players in real-time.

name: Arena King
description: As you speed across the arena, the hexagons fall down behind you. Show off your best driving, drifting, jumping up and flying skills on dynamically changing arena. Ram into your opponents, performing crazy stunts by using ramps, collect boosters, unlock new cars, colors and game modes! name: Brawl Stars
description: Brawl Stars is a multiplayer online battle game where players can team up and fight against each other in various game modes. Players can choose from a variety of characters, each with unique abilities and playstyles. name: Basketball Stars
description: Basketball Stars is a fast-paced multiplayer basketball game where players can compete against each other in 1v1 matches. The game features various courts, characters, and power-ups to enhance the gameplay experience.

name: Tuts Platformer
description: Tuts Platformer is a fun and addictive platform game where players navigate through various levels filled with obstacles and enemies. (This was ai so ya, im to lazy to make a dang description)

name: Hole.io
description: Hole.io is a fun and addictive multiplayer game where players control a black hole and try to consume as many objects as possible to grow larger.

name: Doodle Jump
description: Doodle Jump is a fun and addictive arcade game where players control a character that jumps from platform to platform, avoiding obstacles and enemies.

name: Infinite Craft
description: Infinite Craft is a sandbox game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks. Players can gather resources, craft items, and create structures in a 3D environment.

name: 2-3-4 Player Games
description: A collection of fun and exciting games that can be played with 2, 3, or 4 players. Perfect for friends and family gatherings!

name: Gimme the Airpod
description: Gimme the Airpod is a fun and addictive arcade game where players control a character and fight their opponent to the death for a dang airpod.

name: Helix Jump
description: Helix Jump is a fun and addictive arcade game where players control a bouncing ball that jumps through a helix tower. The goal is to navigate the ball through the gaps in the tower while avoiding obstacles.

name: Mini Golf
description: Mini Golf is a fun and addictive arcade game where players navigate through various mini-golf courses, avoiding obstacles and aiming for the hole.

name: Mr. Bullet
description: Mr. Bullet is a fun and addictive puzzle game where players solve challenges by shooting bullets to eliminate enemies and complete levels.

name: Geometry Dash
description: Geometry Dash is a rhythm-based platformer game where players navigate through levels filled with obstacles by jumping and flying to the beat of the music.

name: Time Shooter 2
description: Time Shooter 2 is a first-person shooter game where players can manipulate time to dodge bullets and defeat enemies. The game features various levels and challenges.

name: Time Shooter 3
description: Time Shooter 3 is a first-person shooter game where players can manipulate time to dodge bullets and defeat enemies. The game features various levels and challenges.

name: Super Mario Bros (NES)
description: Super Mario Bros is a classic platform game where players control Mario as he navigates through various levels to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.

name: Superhot
description: Superhot is a unique first-person shooter game where time moves only when you move. Players must strategize their movements to defeat enemies and complete levels.

name: Subway Surfers
description: Subway Surfers is an endless runner game where players control a character running through subway tracks, dodging trains and collecting coins.

name: Stickman Hook
description: Stickman Hook is a fun and addictive arcade game where players control a stickman swinging through various obstacles using a grappling hook.

name: Soccer Random
description: Soccer Random is a fun and chaotic soccer game where players control random characters to score goals and win matches.

name: Rocket League
description: Rocket League is a vehicular soccer video game where players control rocket-powered cars to hit a ball into the opposing team's goal.

name: Retro Bowl College
description: Lead your college team to victory in this retro-style American football game. Manage your roster, call plays, and win the Retro Bowl!

name: Pacman
description: Pacman is a classic arcade game where players control Pacman to eat dots and avoid ghosts. The goal is to clear the maze while avoiding being caught.

name: Minecraft (1.12)
description: Minecraft is a sandbox game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks. Players can gather resources, craft items, and create structures in a 3D environment. This game is an unofficial port of the original game. Eaglercraft is a Minecraft client that allows you to play Minecraft in your web browser.

name: Jello Tetrix
description: Jello Tetrix is a fun and colorful puzzle game where players arrange falling jello blocks to create complete lines.

name: Google Snake
description: The classic Google Snake game where you control a snake to eat food and grow longer. Avoid running into walls or yourself!

name: Flappy Bird
description: Flappy Bird is a simple yet addictive game where players control a bird and navigate it through pipes by tapping the screen.

name: Crossy Road
description: Crossy Road is a fun and addictive arcade game where players control a character trying to cross roads, rivers, and train tracks while avoiding obstacles.

name: Boxing Random
description: Boxing Random is a fun and chaotic boxing game where players control random characters to fight in the ring.

name: Block Blast
description: Block Blast is a fun and addictive puzzle game where players match blocks of the same color to clear them from the board.

name: Basket Random
description: Basket Random is a fun and chaotic basketball game where players control random characters to shoot hoops and score points.

name: Moto X3M
description: Moto X3M is a thrilling motorcycle racing game where players navigate through challenging tracks filled with obstacles and stunts.

name: Moto X3M Winter
description: Moto X3M Winter is a thrilling motorcycle racing game where players navigate through snowy tracks filled with obstacles and stunts.

name: Moto X3M 2
description: Moto X3M 2 is a thrilling motorcycle racing game where players navigate through challenging tracks filled with obstacles and stunts.

name: Moto X3M Spooky Land
description: Moto X3M Spooky Land is a thrilling motorcycle racing game where players navigate through spooky-themed tracks filled with obstacles and stunts.

name: Moto X3M Pool Party
description: Moto X3M Pool Party is a thrilling motorcycle racing game where players navigate through challenging pool-themed tracks filled with obstacles and stunts.

name: 1v1.lol
description: 1v1.lol is a multiplayer online battle royale game where players can build, shoot, and outsmart their opponents in a 1v1 showdown. name: Paper.io
description: Paper.io is a multiplayer online game where players control a square and try to capture territory by drawing lines. The goal is to eliminate other players and expand your territory.

name: Retro Bowl
description: Lead your team to glory in this retro-style American football game. Manage your roster, call plays, and win the Retro Bowl!

name: Slope
description: Control a ball rolling down a steep slope. Avoid obstacles and keep the ball on the track as long as possible in this fast-paced 3D game.

name: Cookie Clicker
description: The original idle game where you click cookies to bake more cookies. Buy upgrades, hire grandmas, and unlock achievements!

name: Drift Boss
description: Drift your way to victory in this car drifting game. Navigate through challenging tracks, perform drifts, and collect coins to unlock new cars.

name: Tetris
description: The timeless classic puzzle game. Arrange the falling blocks (Tetriminos) to create complete horizontal lines.
